Plumbing.note: New tank and vault installation, low and high pressure lines

Electrical.note: Existing electrical panel to be protected per drawings

Surveying.note: Control points and benchmarks established using GPS

Hydraulic.note: Ensign Downs pump station and pressure zones

Environmental.note: Erosion control plans with silt fence and straw wattle

Site Preparation.note: Mobilization plan including access paths and staging areas

Demolition.note: Removal of existing gates, valves, and piping; protection of existing features
